channel.title: Off Topic
channel.description:
Take it to the O/T forum for all your rants, raves, and disgusts that have nothing to do with Inf.
Warning: Some material in this forum may offend. Usual forum rules apply.

item.title: Takedown
item.author: invalid@example.com (jayhova)
item.dc:creator: jayhova
item.content:encoded: What is the general feeling on the Serellan LLC Takedown progect that got funded by Kickstart recently?

item.title: For The Witcher fans
item.author: invalid@example.com (C.Inigo)
item.dc:creator: C.Inigo
item.content:encoded:
Seasons greetings!

Now, nobody here probably remembers me, or this place, but I just got done releasing a mod I'd been working on for The Witcher 2. Thought I might share it with those interested who still have that game.
Check it out at http://www.nexusmods.com/witcher2/mods/776

item.title: Official signature TEST thread !
item.author: invalid@example.com (DarkBls)
item.dc:creator: DarkBls
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the new official sig thread.

Note: You don't need to post each time to see what your new sig/avatar looks like. Just hit your browser refresh buton after updating your profile !

The content of this thread will be deleted after about 40 posts.

Keep you sig at a 56K user-friendly and under the 40KB limit.

HTML is NOT allowed in signature !

item.title: ACE 3 for Arma 3.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Logan6)
item.dc:creator: Logan6
item.content:encoded: Just a heads up. Ace 3 for Arma 3 is now available on github. Its just the code right now (Alpha) so you have to compile it.

item.title: Stalker mod reload animations
item.author: invalid@example.com (chuckus)
item.dc:creator: chuckus
item.content:encoded:
Tons of problems with the stalker engine but the modding community makes it one of my all time favorite franchises.

If they could merge this level of quality with misery i'd be extremely happy.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/AX65WRWLQcE

item.title: Come play Insurgency with me.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Derelan)
item.dc:creator: Derelan
item.content:encoded:
http://www.playinsurgency.com/

Come play. Come now. INF for Source engine. Used to be an old HL2 mod, now is standalone game for $15 ($8 when on sale). Very fun, tons of players, very realistic (no kill messages, suppression effects, cool looking scopes, bullet penetration, etc)

Come now. My Insurgency name is moeburn.

Also, for anyone that sees this post, wtf are you doing here?

item.title: the new Arma?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Logan6)
item.dc:creator: Logan6
item.content:encoded:
DCS:EDGE

This is a pic of whats coming in the the new DCS:World graphics. Pretty nice! Definite FPS level grapics, IN A REALISTIC COMBAT FLIGHT SIMULATOR! All we need now is some Arma 2 level vehicles for placeholders until they get realistic vehicle modules going. The land area is HUGE! Think 1000 times bigger than Altis. This could be the next Infiltration, if the right modders get involved.

item.title: Very, very disturbing!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Logan6)
item.dc:creator: Logan6
item.content:encoded:
http://www.reddit.com/r/arma/commen...nding_files_from_your_hard_drive_to/?sort=new

Battleye is basically just a hack that scans your WHOLE hard drive, and then sends whatever files it likes back to a master server. ITS JUST HACKING YOUR COMPUTER! Fucking BIS assholes!

Beware of Battleye!

item.title: So what do you guy's think about Arma 3?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Logan6)
item.dc:creator: Logan6
item.content:encoded:
I like the new player movement. A lot less clunky. The real problem with the game is there are few assets and no missions.

Maybe it needs the "INF" treatment?

item.title: Receiver: Another gun simulator
item.author: invalid@example.com (Derelan)
item.dc:creator: Derelan
item.content:encoded:
You fans of INF should check out this brand new indie game called Receiver:

http://youtu.be/GCThInmzjXw

[M]http://youtu.be/GCThInmzjXw[/M]

Simulates every thing a gun can do. Has separate keys for pull slide, retract slide, pull slide halfway, cock hammer, toggle safety, and much more. There's no ammo count, you have to physically look at your magazine (even most realistic games just do a 'feels heavy' weight check) to see how many bullets are left, and you also have to...

Receiver: Another gun simulator

item.title: So how long does weed acctually stay in your system?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mr. HotDog)
item.dc:creator: Mr. HotDog
item.content:encoded: Everyone i ask has a different answer. I've heard allot of people say that drug tests can detect weed in your system for up to 3 months, after you've done it. Anyone have any links to legit sources that can clear this question up. I've never smoked weed, so how long would it stay in my body (so if i were to take a drug test)? I'm just asking, its not like i'm gonna do it or anything......................lol

item.title: Insurgency 2 Playable Alpha
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gnam)
item.dc:creator: Gnam
item.content:encoded:
Don't know if any of you remember the Insurgency mod for Half-life 2, but they've had a sequel in the works and it's already available on Steam.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/222880/

The initial build gave the wrong impression - the classes were called "skirmisher," "grunt" and tank", sprint speeds were excessively high, and recoil was pretty low. A kill cam gave you a COD-like view of each enemy that killed you, and the weapon selection seamed kinda random - with items...

Insurgency 2 Playable Alpha

item.title: Arma 3 Alpha available on Steam for $30, improves movement
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gnam)
item.dc:creator: Gnam
item.content:encoded:
Personally it seems like an ultra-steep price for an unfinished product (even their finished products have plenty of bugs), but Dslyecxi has already put together a video showing off the basic moving and shooting mechanics, which are a vast improvement over Arma 2.

[M]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=G8vrbzNYEwM#t=428s[/M]

They've added a "tactical speed" to iron sight movement, which functions similarly to INF's jogging during IS.

item.title: Two interesting HL2 mods
item.author: invalid@example.com (andy_kosela)
item.dc:creator: andy_kosela
item.content:encoded:
Recently I stumbled upon two interesting HL2: Source mods that might interest Infiltration community.

The first one is OccupationCS which is still actively being developed

http://www.moddb.com/mods/occupation-source

Game Summary:
Engage in ultra realistic fire fights with AI and/or players in 6 Game Modes: Death Match, Team Death Match, Fallback, Surge, Hold and Control. Play with 3 possible Combat Profiles: Hollywood, Regulation or Realism. The ongoing mission of the...

Two interesting HL2 mods

item.title: ArmA 2 finally CQB fiendly?
item.author: invalid@example.com (-RoMe-infers)
item.dc:creator: -RoMe-infers
item.content:encoded:
Guys, i want to know what you think of that:
http://forums.bistudio.com/showthread.php?t=109628

[M]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EMsRa-7Zb0U&feature=player_embedded[/M]

Did anyone tried it? Does it fix the cqb robotic feel? Apparently it does, but i dont want to get my hopes up before any confirmation.

Galzohar? Zeep? Anyone? Did you try it?

item.title: Sui Generis
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psychomorph)
item.dc:creator: Psychomorph
item.content:encoded:
http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1473965863/sui-generis

A low-fantasy open world RPG. A game based on physics and realism. Basically like Infiltration, only isometric medieval RPG.




...

Sui Generis
